details: So-called bilious symptoms, with headache. Despondent and irritable.

Head: Nose red
Aches as if top of head would fly off
Arteries of forehead throb
Abdomen: Deep pain in right side over liver, going through back
Face: Yellow; tongue yellow, coated, taking imprint of teeth
Throat: Sensation as if something hung down from posterior nares; cannot get it up or down
Male: Burning and swelling of the prepuce, with redness of meatus

name: Yucca filamentosa
